text: Ria Christina Gerodias Fariñas (born March 6, 1984) is a Filipino politician. She represented the 1st District of Ilocos Norte in the Philippine House of Representatives from 2019 until 2022. She lost her re-election bid in May 2022 to Sandro Marcos, the son of the presidential candidate Bongbong Marcos, in a landslide. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Ilocos Norte
title: Ria Christina Fariñas
